类 RecipeService

java.lang.Object
model.RecipeService
public class RecipeService extends Object
RecipeService provides comprehensive business logic for recipe management operations. This service handles recipe CRUD operations, ingredient management, preparation steps, and nutritional calculations through database interactions.
从以下版本开始:
1.0

  • 方法详细资料

    • updateImageUrls

      public LinkedHashMap<Integer,String> updateImageUrls(String recipeName)
      Retrieves image URLs for recipes matching the given name.
      参数:
      recipeName - The name of the recipe to search for
      返回:
      A LinkedHashMap mapping recipe IDs to their image URLs

    • updateImageNames

      public ArrayList<String> updateImageNames(String recipeName)
      Retrieves recipe names for recipes matching the given name pattern.
      参数:
      recipeName - The name pattern to search for
      返回:
      An ArrayList of recipe names

    • getRecipeByID

      public Recipe getRecipeByID(Integer id)
      Retrieves a recipe by its unique identifier.
      参数:
      id - The unique ID of the recipe
      返回:
      The Recipe object, or null if not found

    • getIngredientByID

      public List<RecipeIngredient> getIngredientByID(Integer id)
      Retrieves all ingredients for a specific recipe.
      参数:
      id - The recipe ID
      返回:
      A list of RecipeIngredient objects for the recipe

      public void updateRecipe(Recipe recipe)
      Updates an existing recipe in the database.
      参数:
      recipe - The Recipe object with updated information

    • addRecipe

      public Integer addRecipe(Recipe recipe)
      Adds a new recipe to the database.
      参数:
      recipe - The Recipe object to add
      返回:
      The ID of the newly created recipe, or 0 if failed
